reviewText: This video is basically just the artist sketching cars with a few tips about his process. Some good techniques, but not enough technical discussion. I felt that the sketching should have been half the video, then I would have like to see him actually finish some designs. I have a feeling that there is a part 2 video: Techniques of Harald Belker 2: Digital Automotive Rendering that would be better for someone to go straight to instead of buying this video first. I realize the title is "Introduction to Car Design and Drawing", but it's far too basic for anyone.

In this first DVD of a serie of 3, Harald Belker give good tips about finding the design of the vehicle (thumbnail sketches) and also gives a clear exemple of line refinement, preparing the sketch to be rendered.
Very good for beginners and also for professionals who wants to improve their knowledge.
